Lyric:
[00:12.799]I heard that you're settled down
[00:19.239]That you found a girl and you're married now
[00:27.779]I heard that your dreams came true
[00:33.519]Guess she gave you things I didn't give to you
[00:41.119]Old friend, why are you so shy?
[00:48.300]Ain't like you to hold back
[00:51.299]or hide from the light
[00:55.390]I hate to turn up out of the blue uninvited
[00:58.890]But I couldn't stay away, I couldn't fight it
[01:02.760]I had hoped you'd see my face
[01:06.019]And that you'd be reminded that for me
[01:09.100]it isn't over
[01:13.570]Never mind, I'll find someone like you
[01:19.360]I wish nothing but the best for you, too
[01:26.600]Don't forget me, I beg
[01:29.589]I remember you said
[01:33.220]"Sometimes it lasts in love
[01:36.500]But sometimes it hurts instead"
[01:41.000]Sometimes it lasts in love
[01:42.760]But sometimes it hurts instead, yeah
[01:50.800]You know how the time flies
[01:56.339]Only yesterday was the time of our lives
[02:03.270]We were born and raised in a summer haze
[02:10.439]Bound by the surprise of our glory days
[02:18.349]I hate to turn up out of the blue uninvited
[02:22.490]But I couldn't stay away, I couldn't fight it
[02:25.999]I had hoped you'd see my face
[02:27.999]And that you'd be reminded that for me
[02:30.309]it isn't over
[02:36.219]Never mind, I'll find someone like you
[02:43.490]I wish nothing but the best for you, too
[02:49.529]Don't forget me, I beg
[02:53.199]I remember you said
[02:57.090]"Sometimes it lasts in love
[02:59.599]But sometimes it hurts instead"
[03:04.529]Nothing compares
[03:06.499]No worries or cares
[03:08.499]Regrets and mistakes, they're memories made
[03:12.499]Who would have known how bittersweet
[03:17.299]this would taste?
[03:24.099]Nevermind, I'll find someone like you
[03:30.959]I wish nothing but the best for you
[03:37.928]Don't forget me, I beg
[03:41.459]I remember you said
[03:45.029]Sometimes it lasts in love
[03:47.589]But sometimes it hurts instead"
[03:53.279]Nevermind, I'll find someone like you
[03:59.439]I wish nothing but the best for you, too
[04:06.399]Don't forget me, I beg
[04:09.929]I remember you said
[04:13.578]Sometimes it lasts in love
[04:16.019]But sometimes it hurts instead
[04:20.557]Sometimes it lasts in love
[04:23.088]But sometimes it hurts instead, yeah
